title: Type on Flickr
content:
Hello

I thought some of you might be interested in my Flickr site which has a pretty good collection of 'Random signs and bits of type seen whilst I walk around aimlessly'. Not big branded stuff that we all know, more the homemade/sign-writer/weathered-and-looks-unusual kinda thing.

I'm sure I'm not the only one to record type-in-action that's interesting, so if anyone else has something similar, feel free to share!

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/46913941@N02/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023121519/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/46913941@N02/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/46913941@N02/")
author: robw

comments.content: That is an interesting collection of samples.
